name: I N V E R T E B R A E
name_original: I N V E R T E B R A E
description:
welcome into i n v e r t e b r a e

Invertebrae is a short text adventure about a person coming home from work, and then the time after, and then the time before.

The game runs in your browser! If you have a smaller monitor, you might need to zoom out a bit. Also, make sure your sound is on!

If you get to a point where you're stuck and really sure you can't figure it out (I promise, there are no soft-locks, and there is a definite ending), feel free to check out the story guide.
